channel.title: Comments on: Build MySQL Cluster 7.1 from source – including MySQL Cluster Connector for Java
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.description: [...] you interested in MySQL Clustering? I am. Andew Morgan has a new post introducing a tutorial to Build MySQL Cluster 7.1 from source – including MySQL Cluster Connector for Java. With Alex Fatkulin maybe running into an as yet possibly, sort of , kinda non-discovered bug, [...]
